title: Linear Inequalities
description: Theoretical foundations of linear and integer programming. Topics include representation of polyhedra, polarity, simplex and ellipsoid algorithms, diophantine equations, Hilbert bases, total dual integrality, and others.

prerequisites: MATH 4305 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
